mapper.select: SELECT ad.* FROM approval_doc ad JOIN approval_line al ON ad.doc_id = al.doc_id WHERE al.approver_id = #{empId} AND al.line_status = '진행중'
SELECT ad.* FROM approval_doc ad JOIN emp e ON ad.EMPLYR_ID = e.EMPLYR_ID WHERE e.DEPT_ID = #{deptId} AND ad.doc_status = '진행중'

SELECT ac.cc_id, ac.EMPLYR_ID, ac.cc_status, ac.read_dt, ac.doc_id, ad.doc_title, ad.EMPLYR_ID AS drafter_name, ad.doc_status, ad.created_dt, ad.final_dt FROM approval_cc ac JOIN approval_doc ad ON ac.doc_id = ad.doc_id WHERE ac.EMPLYR_ID = #{empId} ORDER BY ad.created_dt DESC

SELECT d.doc_id, d.doc_title, d.doc_status, d.created_dt, f.approform_name, u.user_nm AS emp_name, dp.departments_name AS dept_name, d.open_yn, d.sec_level, d.retention, d.approval_content FROM approval_doc d JOIN approval_form f ON d.approform_id = f.approform_id JOIN comtnemplyrinfo u ON d.emplyr_id = u.emplyr_id LEFT JOIN departments dp ON u.departments_id = dp.departments_id WHERE d.doc_id = #{docId}
SELECT apprform_html FROM approval_form WHERE apprform_id = #{formId}
